long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our pollen count tracker allows you to check the pollen count in your local area by entering your postcode or town/ city. It will display a pollen reading from 1 (very low) to 5 (very high) for a number of different pollens. These include Trees, Grasses and Weeds.
